backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, team management, access control, mail notifications, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend file changes to feature IDs, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text providing short summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling defining color variables, light/dark themes, and base element rules.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point with basic metadata and script loader without domain-specific URLs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hash-based routing, authentication state, profile modal, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal shown on first login allowing users to save their display name.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfList.ts: Empty placeholder replacing removed PDF list feature.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfUploade: Empty placeholder replacing removed PDF upload feature.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with branding, navigation, login controls, and unread inbox badge.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Provides a page container with optional title/description and configurable max-width layout.
frontend/src/components/teams/JoinReques: Renders a join-team button with logic for authentication, membership status, pending requests, and team limits.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamFootag: Displays team video footage with loading skeletons or an empty-state message when no videos exist.
Handles video file selection, validation, progress tracking, and upload of team footage.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamIconUp: Allows selecting, previewing, validating, and clearing an image file for a team icon.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides queries for the caller's user profile and role using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for team membership, team CRUD, join requests, inbox actions, and related mutations with cache invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes along with global styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTeamPage.tsx: UI for creating a team, handling name input, optional icon upload, membership checks, and navigation after creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, navigation buttons, and feature cards based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Displays user inbox with mail selection, read/delete actions, and approving or denying join requests.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderDashboardPage.t: Shows teams led by the user, highlighting pending join requests and providing navigation to team details.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Team detail view that loads team data, handles icon upload, footage display, join requests, and allows leaders to disband the team.
frontend/src/pages/TeamListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all teams with icons, member counts, and navigation to each teamâ€™s detail page.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Utility functions converting raw image bytes to object URLs or base64 data URLs for rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout with custom theme settings and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Bey Hub X app.
